source.a60e131d:
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
from prophet import Prophet

ds = pd.read_csv("../input/covid19-osaka-city-in-japan-data/covid19_osaka_daily_data.csv")
source.34e9a5bc:
ds_pred = pd.DataFrame()
ds_pred["ds"]=ds.date
ds_pred["y"]=ds.cumulative_sum_positive_daily

m = Prophet()
m.fit(ds_pred)
source.e0e248a7:
future = m.make_future_dataframe(periods=365)
forecast = m.predict(future)
fig1 = m.plot(forecast)
source.bf535764:
from prophet.plot import plot_plotly, plot_components_plotly

plot_plotly(m, forecast)
source.b3a0a80d:
ds_pred = pd.DataFrame()
ds_pred["ds"]=ds.date
ds_pred["y"]=ds.positive_daily

m = Prophet()
m.fit(ds_pred)
source.d5e94211:
future = m.make_future_dataframe(periods=365)
forecast = m.predict(future)
fig1 = m.plot(forecast)
source.97768252:
from prophet.plot import plot_plotly, plot_components_plotly

plot_plotly(m, forecast)
source.5b4086c5: ## Using prophet to predict Cov19 cases in Osaka
